rooms.description: North-facing entrance with ample natural light; includes a foyer and reception area.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall, ensuring maximum sunlight.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for both casual and formal dining.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area; incorporates Vastu compliant alignment with east-west axis.
Guest bedroom on ground floor for convenience, designed with Vastu principles for peaceful rest.

openings.details: Large door to accommodate natural light and ease of access.
Floor-to-ceiling window for maximum daylight in living area.

rooms.description: Generous master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; north-facing windows for optimal light.
Additional bedroom designed according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Another bedroom with ample space and natural ventilation.
Ensuite bathroom attached to master bedroom, featuring Vastu-aligned placement for privacy.

openings.details: Floor-to-ceiling window in the master bedroom ensuring light and ventilation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom with adequate natural light and Vastu-compliant layout.
Dedicated home office with north-facing window for enhanced productivity; designed to be quiet and well-ventilated.
Small dressing space adjacent to master bedroom, incorporating Vastu principles for personal comfort.

openings.details: Floor-to-ceiling window in the home office ensuring natural light and energy.
Ventilation gap to improve air circulation.
